item.title: Amber R. Edwards
item.description:
Digital History Ph. D. Student

About Me

My name is Amber Edwards and I am a first year Digital History PhD student at Clemson University, studying 20th Century American History with a concentration in Women, Gender, and Sexuality.

I am from Louisville, KY and attended Centre College in Danville, KY where I found my passion for history and studying women, gender, and sexuality. I was also introduced to digital history methods and oral history practices â€“ interacting with the Centre and local Danville communities for campus projects. In 2022 I graduated with a dual major Bachelor of Arts in History and French. After graduation I moved to Greenville, SC and worked as a Technical Recruiter before returning to school to continue pursuing a career as a Historian!
